v.
Philadelphia Zoning Board Of Adjustment Sheldon Schwartz, Kenneth L. Baritz, Esquire v. Philadelphia Zoning Board Of Adjustment Sheldon Schwartz, Kenneth L. Baritz, Esquire v. Philadelphia Zoning Board Of Adjustment; Petition of Paul Abeln, Sheldon Schwartz, Rachel Lisitsa, Stephanie Burns, Elizabeth Clanaman, Jessica Nabitovsky NO. 675 EAL 2015 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania June 07, 2016 Appeal from the Commonwealth Court.

Disposition: Denied.
